channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: At 4:45pm today, stop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth where researchers Kihyuk Sohn, Lu Jiang & Irfan Essa will present StyleDrop, a text-to-image sy...
item.description: At 4:45pm today, stop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth where researchers Kihyuk Sohn, Lu Jiang & Irfan Essa will present StyleDrop, a text-to-image synthesis tool that can leverage reference images to ensure style-consistent generation.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Med-PaLM is an #LLM designed to provide high quality answers to medical questions. Learn all about it today at 4:45pm, when Tao Tu will be at the #Neu...
item.description: Med-PaLM is an #LLM designed to provide high quality answers to medical questions. Learn all about it today at 4:45pm, when Tao Tu will be at the #NeurIPS2023 Google to discuss Med-PaLM's capabilities.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congratulations to Jeff Dean, Greg Corrado, & co-authors of the paper ‚ÄúDistributed Representations of Words and Phrases and their Compositionality‚Äù,...
item.description: Congratulations to Jeff Dean, Greg Corrado, & co-authors of the paper ‚ÄúDistributed Representations of Words and Phrases and their Compositionality‚Äù, for winning the #NeurIPS2023 Test of Time Award! This prize recognizes a highly impactful paper published at NeurIPS 10 years ago.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Learning with #DifferentialPrivacy often involves adding noise into the learning process. At 3:20pm today, Krishna Pillutla will be at the #NeurIPS202...
item.description: Learning with #DifferentialPrivacy often involves adding noise into the learning process. At 3:20pm today, Krishna Pillutla will be at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth to explain why it is beneficial in DP algorithms to add noise that is correlated across time. Drop by to hear more!
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We are excited to present our latest advances in extreme-scale graph embedding, powered by #TPU AI chips. Join @phanein and @tsitsulin_ at #NeurIPS202...
item.description: We are excited to present our latest advances in extreme-scale graph embedding, powered by #TPU AI chips. Join @phanein and @tsitsulin_ at #NeurIPS2023 at 3:20PM at the Google Booth to learn more.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congratulations to Googlers Santiago Balseiro, Haihao Lu, & Vahab Mirrokni for winning the 2023 INFORMS Revenue Management and Pricing Section Prize (...
item.description:
Congratulations to Googlers Santiago Balseiro, Haihao Lu, & Vahab Mirrokni for winning the 2023 INFORMS Revenue Management and Pricing Section Prize (https://goo.gle/4851TC3) for "The Best of Many Worlds: Dual Mirror Descent for Online Allocation Problems". Read all about it ‚Üì


Google AI:‚ÄÇOrganizations increasingly need to make real-time decisions in uncertain, dynamic conditions with limited resources. Learn how dual mirror descent helps solve these online allocation problems in a way that is simple, robust, and flexible ‚Üì https://goo.gle/3BlaeTu
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Want to learn more about the new Google Gemini model? Join Jeff Dean and members of the Gemini team at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booths today at 1:30pm ...
item.description:
Want to learn more about the new Google Gemini model? Join Jeff Dean and members of the Gemini team at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booths today at 1:30pm to hear all about it!


Jeff Dean (@üè°):‚ÄÇI'm excited to head to @NeurIPSConf #NeurIPS2023 this week.

We'll be having a couple of "Chat with the Gemini Team" events in the @GoogleDeepMind / @GoogleResearch booth areas on Tuesday and Wednesday from 1:30 to 3:00 PM (New Orleans time). Quite a few Gemini team members will‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1733936083266924979
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Attending #NeurIPS2023? At 12:45pm, visit the Google booth where Xiuye Gu will describe DaTaSeg, a universal multi-dataset, multi-task segmentation mo...
item.description: Attending #NeurIPS2023? At 12:45pm, visit the Google booth where Xiuye Gu will describe DaTaSeg, a universal multi-dataset, multi-task segmentation model well-suited for memory-limited applications, e.g., for multiple segmentation tasks on mobile devices.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Drop by the Google booth at 9:15am today where @laroyo, Meg Risdal & Omar Benjelloun will introduce Croissant ü•ê‚Äîin collaboration with @MLCommons &...
item.description: Drop by the Google booth at 9:15am today where @laroyo, Meg Risdal & Omar Benjelloun will introduce Croissant ü•ê‚Äîin collaboration with @MLCommons & others‚Äîa format for ML datasets with the goal of making datasets interoperable across repos & platforms. https://github.com/mlcommons/croissant
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Working on generative AI models? At 9:15am today, Diana Mincu & Kevin Robinson will be at the @NeurIPSConf Google booth to talk about best practices f...
item.description: Working on generative AI models? At 9:15am today, Diana Mincu & Kevin Robinson will be at the @NeurIPSConf Google booth to talk about best practices for generative AI safety.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Don't miss @laroyo give the #NeurIPS2023 opening Keynote talk, ‚ÄúThe Many Faces of Responsible AI‚Äù, in which she'll discuss the need for culturally-a...
item.description: Don't miss @laroyo give the #NeurIPS2023 opening Keynote talk, ‚ÄúThe Many Faces of Responsible AI‚Äù, in which she'll discuss the need for culturally-aware, society-centered research on the impact of data quality and diversity for training and evaluation of ML models. Happening now!
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Yonatan Bitton is back at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth at 4pm today to present VisIT-Bench, which consists of a tool to test how well models follow v...
item.description: Yonatan Bitton is back at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth at 4pm today to present VisIT-Bench, which consists of a tool to test how well models follow visual instructions + a benchmark that spans a wide range of tasks, from simple recognition to playing games.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Graphs are invaluable for representing & analyzing complex relationships. Drop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth at 4pm today to hear @phanein, @Bahare...
item.description: Graphs are invaluable for representing & analyzing complex relationships. Drop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth at 4pm today to hear @phanein, @BahareFatemi, & Jonathan Halcrow talk about the correct choice of encoders to boost performance on graph reasoning tasks using LLMs.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Starting now!
item.description:
Starting now!


Google AI:‚ÄÇAt 12:15am today, the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth will host Yonatan Bitton for a demo of SeeTRUE, a tool for testing the alignment between text and images that can pinpoint areas of mismatch and can help adjust ranking in text-to-image generation tasks.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: At 12:15am today, the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth will host Yonatan Bitton for a demo of SeeTRUE, a tool for testing the alignment between text and imag...
item.description: At 12:15am today, the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth will host Yonatan Bitton for a demo of SeeTRUE, a tool for testing the alignment between text and images that can pinpoint areas of mismatch and can help adjust ranking in text-to-image generation tasks.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Re Google is also excited to be a Platinum Sponsor of today's #NeurIPS2023 @_LXAI workshop. Attending the workshop? Hear panelist Theo Guidroz at 1:15...
item.description: Re Google is also excited to be a Platinum Sponsor of today's #NeurIPS2023 @_LXAI workshop. Attending the workshop? Hear panelist Theo Guidroz at 1:15pm or talk to any of several other Googlers in attendance to learn all about life at Google! [2/2] https://www.latinxinai.org/neurips-2023
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google is proud to be a Platinum Sponsor of the #NeurIPS2023 @WiMLworkshop happening today. Curious about life at Google? Visit with Lara McConnaughey...
item.description: Google is proud to be a Platinum Sponsor of the #NeurIPS2023 @WiMLworkshop happening today. Curious about life at Google? Visit with Lara McConnaughey during the mentorship hour, or speak with one of the many other Googlers in attendance! [1/2] https://sites.google.com/corp/umich.edu/wiml2023/
item.author: Google AI

item.title: The #NeurIPS2023 Expo floor is now open! If you're attending @NeurIPSConf, stop by the Google booth (#215) where you can chat with researchers, attend...
item.description: The #NeurIPS2023 Expo floor is now open! If you're attending @NeurIPSConf, stop by the Google booth (#215) where you can chat with researchers, attend a demo or Q&A session, and learn about some of our many cutting edge projects. http://goo.gle/47OE0Pv
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We're proud to be a Diamond Level sponsor of this year's annual @NeurIPSConf, which returns to New Orleans, LA. Google has a strong presence at #NeurI...
item.description: We're proud to be a Diamond Level sponsor of this year's annual @NeurIPSConf, which returns to New Orleans, LA. Google has a strong presence at #NeurIPS2023, with >170 papers and participation in 21 workshops and tutorials. Learn about our involvement at https://goo.gle/47OE0Pv
item.author: Google AI
